content.body: I was kinda thinking out loud, and the fact that zone.js was probably the main reason why we were going with registration-time by default is something I noticed just now
I think Jia Li is the person, but I didn’t manage to reach him through Twitter DMs https://x.com/Jialipassion
We can work with other Angular devs to get his attention if we have trouble
Or meet him in Tokyo for TC39 this October! He showed up at last year’s community event
